summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WineStudy country detail pages and aroma filters functionality. All major features working correctly with Portuguese translations.
passed_tests: Country detail page for France (/atlas/france) loads with history, highlights, climate, regions sections
Country detail page for Italy (/atlas/italy) loads correctly with Old World classification
Country detail page for Argentina (/atlas/argentina) loads correctly with New World classification
Aroma filters on Grapes page display Portuguese translations correctly
All 5 aroma filter categories present: Frutas, Florais, Vegetais/Herb√°ceos, Especiarias, Carvalho/Madeira
Multiple aroma filter selection works (Cherry + Black pepper tested)
Active filters display correctly with count and individual removal (X button)
Search functionality on Grapes page works
Navigation from Atlas to Country detail pages works
Country pages show related regions and featured grapes sections
